books.author: by J.R. Ward
books.description: The 16th book in the Black Dagger Brotherhood series. Sola Morte falls for a man who sells weapons to a group of vampire warriors.
books.name: THE THIEF

books.author: by Stuart Woods
books.description: Stone Barrington searches for the person who plotted to kill the woman behind a cutting-edge software startup.
books.name: SHOOT FIRST

books.author: by Catherine Coulter and J.T. Ellison
books.description: The fifth book in the A Brit in the F.B.I. series. After the German vice chancellor dies, special agents investigate one of Dracula’s descendants.
books.name: THE SIXTH DAY

books.author: by Lisa Scottoline
books.description: A woman marries a widower and reunites with her teenage daughter who is murdered soon after, and the husband is put on trial for it.
books.name: AFTER ANNA

books.author: by Ernest Cline
books.description: It’s 2044, life on a resource-depleted Earth is grim, and the key to a vast fortune is hidden in a virtual-reality world.
books.name: READY PLAYER ONE

books.author: by Jeffery Deaver
books.description: Lincoln Rhyme and Amelia Sachs track a killer who targets engaged couples.
books.name: THE CUTTING EDGE

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A search for stolen rare manuscripts leads to a Florida island.
books.name: CAMINO ISLAND

books.author: by Madeline Miller
books.description: Zeus banishes Helios' daughter to an island, where she must choose between living with gods or mortals.
books.name: CIRCE

books.author: by Mary Higgins Clark
books.description: A high school guidance counselor tries to uncover the identity of her sister’s murderer.
books.name: I'VE GOT MY EYES ON YOU

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: A former prisoner of war returns from Vietnam and moves his family to Alaska, where they face tough conditions.
books.name: THE GREAT ALONE

books.author: by Celeste Ng
books.description: An artist upends a quiet town outside Cleveland.
books.name: LITTLE FIRES EVERYWHERE

books.author: by Vi Keeland and Penelope Ward
books.description: A summer fling in the Hamptons between a boss and an employee goes awry.
books.name: REBEL HEIR

books.author: by James Patterson and Marshall Karp
books.description: The fifth book in the NYPD Red series. Detectives Zach Jordan and Kylie MacDonald investigate the death of a documentary filmmaker and an explosion at a charity benefit.
books.name: RED ALERT

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: The author Alexandra Winslow, writing under the pseudonym Alexander Green, creates a double life that isolates her.
books.name: THE RIGHT TIME

books.author: by Lisa Wingate
books.description: A South Carolina lawyer learns about the questionable practices of a Tennessee orphanage.
books.name: BEFORE WE WERE YOURS
